TopicTitle: let's guess the range of the antennas in 1.1.1(or 1.2)

Articles.Content:
from left: Communotron 16, DTS-M1, HG-55(from asteroid day, and will be stock) Communotron 88-88, and three will be added dishs.(S-M-L)

my guess is:

Communotron 16 : kerbin orbit or mun

DTS-M1 : in kerbin system (7~90Mmish?)

88-88 : well, I think it can reach the the Jool but not Eeloo, I guess.

soon to be stock asteroid day : until duna/dres, I guess?( it has same trans speed with kerbin one, but lower power useage..)

what's your guess about ranges in new delayed behind
These ranges will be modifiable as difficulty settings. It was said so in the original announcement already.
